attributes.action: Take £1 from our income tax each month to build a better Africa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We take our hospitals, schools, food and water for granted here and we would like to help Africa by donating just £1 a month from our income tax.
This can be used to provide water, food, health-care and education.
Throughout Africa there is great need for the basics and we have more than enough.
Even though some of us here don't have a lot of money we don't think we'd miss £1 a month if it was deducted from our salary/income tax.
